tag_list: data-field, datafield, enterprise-mobile-application, its-on-mobile, vietnam, outsourcing, mobile-app-development
overview:
Antoine is co-founder and CEO of Datafield, a SaaS empowering enterprise over their field operations.

Antoine has spent the last 6 years in Asia. First in the financial industries, assessing and investing in public and private equity across South-East Asia.

Then, he started up ITS ON MOBILE, a Mobile Application Development company, based in Vietnam. As part of the expansion strategy of ITS ON MOBILE, Antoine envisioned the development of DATAFIELD, a new venture he is currently focusing on.
